name: Gamepad
description: Receive input from a gamepad device, e.g. console controllers.

conditions.name: On gamepad connected
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad device is connected to the computer.

conditions.name: On gamepad disconnected
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad device is disconnected from the computer.

conditions.name: Has gamepads
conditions.description: Test if any gamepad is connected and active. A button may need to be pressed before a gamepad counts as active.

conditions.name: Is button down
conditions.description: Test if a gamepad button is currently held down.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button
params.description: Choose a gamepad button to test.

conditions.name: Compare axis
conditions.description: Test the value of one of the gamepad's axes.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Axis
params.description: Select the gamepad axis to test.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to select the axis value (ranging from -100 to 100).

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare to, from -100 to 100.

conditions.name: On button pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad button is pressed.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button
params.description: Choose a gamepad button to test.

conditions.name: On button released
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad button is released.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button
params.description: Choose a gamepad button to test.

conditions.name: On any button pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when any button on a gamepad is pressed.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test. Use -1 for any gamepad.

conditions.name: On any button released
conditions.description: Triggered when any button on a gamepad is released.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test. Use -1 for any gamepad.

conditions.name: Is button index down
conditions.description: Test if a gamepad button is currently held down, by its numerical index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button index
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the button to test if down.

conditions.name: On button index pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad button is pressed, by its numerical index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button index
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the button to test if pressed.

conditions.name: On button index released
conditions.description: Triggered when a gamepad button is released, by its numerical index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Button index
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the button to test if released.

conditions.name: Gamepad supports vibration type
conditions.description: Check if a currently connected gamepad supports a specific vibration type.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to test.

params.name: Vibration type
params.description: The vibration type to check if supported.

actions.name: Vibrate (dual rumble)
actions.description: Rumble a gamepad using its dual rumble vibration motors, where supported.
actions.display_text: Vibrate (dual rumble) gamepad {0} for [b]{1}[/b] ms (weak magnitude [i]{2}[/i], strong magnitude [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to vibrate.

params.name: Duration
params.description: Time in milliseconds to vibrate for.

params.name: Weak magnitude
params.description: The magnitude of the weak rumble motor from 0-100.

params.name: Strong magnitude
params.description: The magnitude of the strong rumble motor from 0-100.

actions.name: Reset vibration
actions.description: Cancel any current rumble effect on a gamepad.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad.

actions.name: Vibrate (trigger rumble)
actions.description: Rumble a gamepad using its trigger rumble vibration motors, where supported.
actions.display_text: Vibrate (trigger rumble) gamepad {0} for [b]{1}[/b] ms (weak magnitude [i]{2}[/i], strong magnitude [i]{3}[/i], left trigger [i]{4}[/i], right trigger [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the gamepad to vibrate.

params.name: Duration
params.description: Time in milliseconds to vibrate for.

params.name: Weak magnitude
params.description: The magnitude of the weak rumble motor from 0-100.

params.name: Strong magnitude
params.description: The magnitude of the strong rumble motor from 0-100.

params.name: Left trigger
params.description: The magnitude of the rumble for the left trigger from 0-100.

params.name: Right trigger
params.description: The magnitude of the rumble for the right trigger from 0-100.

expressions.name: GamepadCount
expressions.description: The number of currently connected and active gamepads.

expressions.name: GamepadID
expressions.description: A string identifying the gamepad, e.g. manufacturer and model.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

expressions.name: Button
expressions.description: Return button input from 0 to 100 for a button index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

params.name: Index
params.description: Button index.

expressions.name: Axis
expressions.description: Return axis input from -100 to 100 for an axis index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

params.name: Index
params.description: Axis index.

expressions.name: LastButton
expressions.description: Return index of last gamepad button pressed or released.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

expressions.name: RawButton
expressions.description: Return raw button input from 0 to 100 for a button index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

params.name: Index
params.description: Raw button index.

expressions.name: RawAxis
expressions.description: Return raw axis input from -100 to 100 for an axis index.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

params.name: Index
params.description: Raw axis index.

expressions.name: RawButtonCount
expressions.description: Return number of buttons in raw input.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

expressions.name: RawAxisCount
expressions.description: Return number of axes in raw input.

params.name: Gamepad
params.description: Index of the gamepad.

expressions.name: GamepadIndex
expressions.description: In an On gamepad connected/disconnected trigger, or when using On any button pressed/released with a gamepad of -1, this expression indicates the index of the corresponding gamepad.

expressions.name: ButtonIndex
expressions.description: Return index of last gamepad button pressed or released.
